questions.question_text: What is the name of the logical volume that vSphere 6.x uses to store virtual machines files?

choices.A: High inefficiency of the Data Center

discussion.content:
A.High inefficiency of the Data Center
B.High operation expenses

questions.question_text: Which two issues do organizations hope to solve with Data Center Virtualization? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. It requires a compatible Host Bus Adapter in the host.
D.It is a direct attached storage

choices.B: It requires a storage network to communicate with the host.
choices.A: It requires a compatible Host Bus Adapter in the host.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about local storage? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Can handle data across virtual switches.
choices.E: Has the ability to be deployed on any IP network.
choices.C: Can handle data across physical switches.
choices.D: Is independent of the underlying network hardware.

discussion.content:
B. Can handle data across virtual switches.
D. Is independent of the underlying network hardware.
E. Has the ability to be deployed on any IP network

questions.question_text: Which three statements are true regarding VMware NSX? (Choose three.)

choices.A: Use automatic mode in Storage DRS
choices.B: Use manual mode in Storage DRS

questions.question_text: What can an administrator do if they does not want Storage DRS to perform all storage balancing functions?

discussion.content: B. Use manual mode in Storage DRS
